text: (1) The respective density value and volume of the individual test materials must be indicated, since the density of each type of material must be identical when the experiment is repeated, since the degree of degradation of the respective material by vinegar also depends on the material density. 2) The time of washing with water and 3) the amount of water used must be indicated, they must be identical for each material as well as when repeating the experiment. 3) The amount of vinegar must be indicated and the same for each material, 4) All materials in the container must be completely covered with vinegar.
